title: WBHRB Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 5018 Staff Nurse Posts
description: The West Bengal Health Recruitment Board (WBHRB) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 5018 Staff Nurse Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B.Sc Nursing, GNM can apply for the WBHRB Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application...
